SEARCH
Module info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev
Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.iterative

Class IterativeParallelism

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.iterative.IterativeParallelism
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdvancedIP, ListIP, NewListIP, NewScalarIP, ScalarIP
public class IterativeParallelism extends Object implements AdvancedIP
Class to parallelize iterative processing of lists. It splits the list into sequential blocks and processes them in parallel. Each method has threads parameter which indicates the maximum number of these blocks.
Author:
Dunaev Kirill

      Constructs class that will create threads itself.

    • IterativeParallelism

      public IterativeParallelism(ParallelMapper mapper)
      Constructs class that will parallelize list using given the mapper. This class itself will not create new threads.
      Parameters:
      mapper - mapper that will be used

    • joinThreads

      public static void joinThreads(List<Thread> threadList) throws InterruptedException
      Joins the given threads. If thread is interrupted, non-joined threads are interrupted and joined again. All of appeared InterruptedException are added suppressed to the first one.
      Parameters:
      threadList - thread to join
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if this thread is interrupted

    • joinSuppress

      public static void joinSuppress(Thread thread, Exception e)
      Guaranteed to join thread. All of thrown InterruptedException are added suppressed to the given one.
      Parameters:
      thread - thread to join
      e - exception, add new exceptions suppressed to which
